Class serverGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • serverGUI
  • public class serverGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the main code and logic that is surfaced in the server GUI

    • Method Detail

      • cartGUI

        public void cartGUI()
        The cartGUI function creates a GUI for the cart.

      • itemsGUI

        public void itemsGUI()
        The itemsGUI function creates a GUI for the items in the menu. It creates buttons for each item and adds them to an array list. The function also sets up a scroll pane that allows users to see all of the items on one screen.

      • addToAry

        public void addToAry​(java.lang.String name)
        The addToAry function adds the cost of each item in the buttonList to an ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        String -

      • makeHashMap

        public void makeHashMap()
        The makeHashMap function creates a HashMap of the cost and ingredients for each item.

      • totalCartCost

        public java.lang.String totalCartCost()
        The totalCartCost function returns the total cost of all items in the cart.
        Returns:
        String

      • purchaseItems

        public void purchaseItems()
        The purchaseItems function is used to add items to the cart. It takes no parameters and returns nothing. The function adds items from the menu into a list of strings called cartNames, which are then displayed in a text area on the GUI.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        The clear function clears the cartNames, cartPrices, ingredientList and totalCost. It also sets display to an empty string and sets itemsOrderedText to display.

      • managerScreen

        public void managerScreen()
        The managerScreen function creates a GUI for the manager.
